review: It's so easy to hook up and use! Love it!
author: Ruth A Fisher

review: Very easy to install and set up. Many great programs are available.
author: Bob

review: Gave to "The Son-In-Law" for Christmas, He said it set up easy and he loves it !
author: TheMask

review: We love it, the installation was a peace of cake. The selection is mind blogging. You hit a home run with this product.
author: James S. White

review: I ordered the Fire TV Stick twice, The first one was defective, I informed Amazon. The tried to help me on live to no avail. I ordered another and received it the next day, Overnight, what a deal. I plugged the TV Fire stick in my Television, Followed the instructions, which were easy and concise.  Fire TV Stick works as advertised.in fact better than I expected. Also, I commend the technician that assisted, and Amazon.com for the prompt delivery of my replacement unit.
author: A. Bratkovic "Avid Reader"

review: I had the Chrome Cast which I also like...But I Love the way this one works..BIG TIME !!  Easy to use and easy to install...Hooked up to TV followed directions...Love the fact I have access to Prime Movies..
author: A. ARAGON
